actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify that volunteer trustees, directors, and officers of public charities shall not be penalized under the tax laws as a result of such public services.
short_title: Public Charity Tax Penalty Reform Act of 1985

summary.text: Public Charity Tax Penalty Reform Act of 1985 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt officials of public charities who serve on a volunteer or part-time basis from the tax penalties for willful failure to collect and pay over tax.

titles.title: Public Charity Tax Penalty Reform Act of 1985

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify that volunteer trustees, directors, and officers of public charities shall not be penalized under the tax laws as a result of such public services.
